name: Cranberry Orange Muffins with Truvia® Baking Blend
author: Truvia(R)
summary: These tart, fresh-tasting muffins are a bright addition to the breakfast or brunch table. Made with Truvia® Baking Blend, these muffins have 70% less sugar* than the full sugar version.
ingredients: ½ cup unsalted butter, melted and cooled
1 ½ cups cranberries (fresh or frozen), chopped
directions: Prepare muffin tin by greasing cups or use paper liners
In a large bowl, add flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda
In a separate bowl, whisk together butter, Truvia® Baking Blend, orange zest and juice, eggs, vanilla, and milk
Stir the wet mixture into the flour mixture until just combined
Fill each muffin cup about 3/4 full
Bake until golden and a toothpick comes out clean (20-25 minutes)
Cool muffins in pan for 5 minutes, then remove to a wire rack and cool completely
